description: Men's Ultra Scooter Jacket by Unik Ultra is a stylish and practical motorcycle jacket made from distressed gray cowhide leather. It features multiple pockets, including three exterior pockets and two inside concealed carry pockets. The jacket is equipped with silver hardware and a side zip snap-over design. For added comfort, it has a full sleeve zip-out liner.
